2023

  • Vertex AI Matching Engine tutorial - An e2e tutorial on Cloud Shell for Vertex AI Matching Engine building a similar image search system (Python, Terraform).

2022

  • database_cleaner-spanner - An adapter of Database Cleaner for cleaning Cloud Spanner (Ruby)
  • ghrepos-organizer - A CLI tool to organize GitHub repositories in a batch (TypeScript)
  • Brainfuck Board (repo) - A web application to enjoy Brainfuck (TypeScript, Next.js, Vercel)
  • mclauncher - Web UI and a server app to manage Minecraft server on Google Compute Engine (Python, FastAPI, Cloud Run)
  • hubdiary - A CLI to write diary and save it in a GitHub repository (Go)

before 2022

  • bqloader - A simple ETL framework to load data from Google Cloud Storage into BigQuery (Go, Cloud Functions)
  • Cloud Demo Portal - A web app to demonstrate some Google Cloud products (Go, Next.js, App Engine)
  • sekret - An encryption tool for Kubernetes Secrets (Go)
  • x86 Board (repo) - An emulator of x86 working on browsers which has indicators for registers and memories (JavaScript, React)
